ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: REQUESTS SHOULD BE TRANSMITTED VIA EMAIL AND HAVE A COVER LETTER OF NO MORE THAN TWO PAGES COVERING ALL PERTINENT INFORMATION ABOUT THE REQUEST. NO FORM LETTER REQUESTS. SUPPORTIVE DOCUMENTS AND LITERATURE TO INCLUDE CURRENT FINANCIAL STATEMENT, NAME OF BOARD MEMBERS AND OTHER FUNDING SOURCES MAY BE INCLUDED. A COPY OF ORGANIZATION'S 501(C)(3) LETTER OF DETERMINATION FROM IRS MUST BE INCLUDED.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.SubmissionDeadlinesTxt: GRANT REQUESTS ARE DUE TWO WEEKS PRIOR TO BOARD MEETINGS. 2023 MEETING DATES ARE 5/4/2023 AND 12/6/2
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: GENERALLY ONLY ONE GRANT AWARDED TO AN ORGANIZATION PER FISCAL YEAR. GRANT REQUESTS FOR POLITICAL AND LOBBYING EFFORTS, INDIVIDUAL AND RELIGIOUS ORGANIZATIONS WILL NOT BE CONSIDERED.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: Children's Hospital of the King's Daughters
Boys and Girls Club of SEVA
